sentence.Network_en: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

sentence.Network_en: A rock is an inanimate object.
A stone is an inanimate object.
sentence.Network_cn: 石头是一种无生命的物体.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin inanimatus 'lifeless', from in- 'not' + animatus (see animate)

entry.def: An inanimate object is one that has no life.

example.ex: He thought of the baby almost as an inanimate object.
example.tran: 他认为婴儿几乎就是毫无生命的物体。

means.word_mean: 1. belonging to the class of nouns denoting nonliving things;
3. appearing dead; not breathing or having no perceptible pulse;

auth_sentence.content: Caring for inanimate objects came easily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Caring for inanimate objects came easily.

auth_sentence.content: Evolution does not intend to describe how life started from inanimate matter.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in无+anim生命,精神+ate……的→adj.无生命的
long长+anim生命+ous……的→生命耐久→忍耐的
magn大+anim生命+ous……的→大生命→心胸博大
un=uni一个+anim生命+ous……的→[大家]同一个生命→一致的
anim生命,精神+al物→有生命的东西→动物
animate[v.使有生气,活泼]+ion动作或状态→animation生动;动画
anim生命,精神+osity多……的状态→生命太多→由爱变恨→仇恨
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静

sentences.en: A stone is an inanimate object.
sentences.cn: 石头是一种无生命的物体。
